name: Kaleidos
description:
An hardcore runner 3D. Experience high speed movement to reach the end of each level. Avoid walls, destroy doors and have fun !

Keys : 

- "Q"/ LB to go left

- "D"/ RB to go right

- Press "Spacebar" to destroy doors

Made by : 
Clément Clerc - Programmer
Alexis Ferrand - Lead Game Designer
Alexandres Mezanges - Sound Designer / Level Designer
Gwendal Bonnerue - Artistic Direction
